message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.RO 

The paper deals with the development of a learning method for automatic wayfinding based on verbal navigational instructions. This involves the use of neural network agents and the mental formalization of verbal navigational instructions. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper also involves computer vision (cs.CV), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), and robotics (cs.RO) as it deals with the development of a learning method for automatic wayfinding.
